meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6723.

td.p: Brock Thompson, a librarian at the Library of Congress from Washington, D.C.
Kaya Blauvelt, a paraeducator from Portland, Oregon
Carlos Ross, a customer service representative from Austin, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $34,801)

tr.td: HAVE A DRINK
FINLANDIA
CANADIAN CLUB
ON THE ROCKS
FEELING TIP"SY"
(Alex: Each correct response will end in "S-Y".)

Kaya

(Alex: No. Sorry. "What is [*]?")
(Carlos: Oh, duh!)
(Alex: You added too much information. "Duh." Yes. Sorry about that.)

the Ides of April

Carlos
')
